title: Suspicious LoL Installer publisher
body:
Hello! 

I just got a new computer and ofcourse, i want LoL on it.

However, when i started downloading it, i noticed the Publisher was:

riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net

I hadn't seen the akamaihd Before so i googled it and it said it was a virus

Help?

replies.body:
As long as you make sure you're grabbing the installer from [**here**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/), you should be good to go!

https://i.gyazo.com/89177936ddcde5736d5b8cf64b0edcec.jpg
